text: Ezɨ gumazir kam kamaghɨn Joap ikaragha ghaze, “Nɨ silvan dagɨar 1,000pla isɨ na danɨngightɨ, kɨ bizitamɨn atrivimɨn otarim damighan kogham. E bar ikiava orazima, atrivim akar gavgavir kam isa nɨ ko Abisai ko Itai, a ia mɨkeme. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ia gumazir igiar kam Apsalomɨn ganighɨva, a gasɨghasɨghan markɨ.’
